inclusion.criterion: mitral valve repair with cardiopulmonary bypass
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: severe mitral annular and leaflet calcification
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: hypertrophic cardiomyopathy with systolic anterior motion of the leaflets
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has symptomatic functional mitral regurgitation and meets criteria for mitral valve repair. However, patient's history of hypertrophic cardiomyopathy may be a contraindication.
